mapper.select: SELECT p.user_id AS user_id, p.id AS id, p.post_image_url AS post_image_url, i.image_url AS image_url, u.profile_image_url AS profile_image_url, u.user_name AS user_name, u.account_id AS account_id FROM posts p INNER JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id INNER JOIn items i ON p.id = i.post_id WHERE i.category = #{category} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT 3;
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET name = #{name}, price = #{price}, category = #{category}, stock = #{stock}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, description = #{description}, is_active = #{isActive}, created_at = #{createdAt} WHERE id = #{id}
